Trinkets

Boots, greaves etc.

Boots are items that go on your feet. They can be enchanted randomly with one of the Clothing enhancements or be one of the named drops found below.


Item Special Abilities ML Bind Quest Chest

  • Expeditious RetreatExpeditious Retreat

  • Constitution +5 Constitution +5: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +5 enhancement bonus to Constitution.

Boots of Corrosion
  • Corrosion +48Corrosion +48: Passive: +48 Equipment bonus to Acid Spell Power.
  • Nullification +48Nullification +48: Passive: +48 Equipment bonus to Negative (Necrotic) and Poison Spell Power.
  • Acid Resistance Acid Resistance: This property absorbs the first 10 points of acid damage per attack that the wearer would normally take.
  • Might of the AbishaiMight of the Abishai:
    When any three of the items are equipped you will gain a +1 profane bonus to Natural Armor, a +1 profane bonus to Strength, and a +1 bonus to your caster level on evocation spells.
    When all five items are equipped you will gain a +1 profane bonus to Natural Armor, a +1 profane bonus to Strength and Constitution, and a +1 bonus to your caster level on evocation and conjuration spells.
